areaSection: Javea (Xàbia) sits on the northern Costa Blanca, blessed with a Mediterranean climate of over 300 sunshine days annually. This picturesque coastal town balances authentic Spanish charm with modern infrastructure, nestled between dramatic limestone cliffs and azure waters. The region's geography creates multiple distinctive neighborhoods, with Tosalet positioned among the most prestigious, offering elevation advantages that provide panoramic views across the Mediterranean. Javea's prosperity stems from its thriving expat community—primarily British, German, and Dutch residents—who have cultivated a cosmopolitan atmosphere while preserving the town's Spanish essence. The combination of natural beauty, cultural sophistication, and year-round temperate climate makes Javea consistently rank among Spain's most desirable residential destinations.
lifestyleSection: Life in Javea epitomizes Mediterranean elegance without sacrificing modern convenience. The established expat community has created an English-speaking infrastructure that ensures seamless daily living, from healthcare consultations to grocery shopping. Mornings might begin with café con leche at a beachfront chiringuito overlooking the Arenal's Blue Flag beach, while afternoons offer golf at Jávea Golf Club or explorations of hidden coves like Granadella. The weekly markets pulse with energy, offering both local produce and international products at the British Corner Shop and other specialized retailers. Restaurants range from traditional paella venues to contemporary fusion dining, catering to sophisticated palates. The community spirit remains strong—yacht clubs, cultural events, and social organizations provide natural networking for newcomers. Healthcare access is excellent, with English-speaking doctors and proximity to quality hospitals ensuring peace of mind. This is not retirement living; it's an actively pursued lifestyle by professionals and families who refuse compromise.
investmentSection: From an investment perspective, this Javea villa occupies an attractive position in Costa Blanca's appreciating market. Regional property values have grown 6% year-on-year, with Javea consistently outperforming broader Costa Blanca benchmarks. Positioned 30% below Mallorca pricing, yet offering equivalent lifestyle amenities, savvy investors recognize Javea's relative value. The rental market demonstrates consistent strength, with comparable properties achieving €1,400 for weekly lettings during peak season—translating to approximately 7-9% annual gross yields for owner-operators. The established international community ensures year-round demand from short-term holiday rentals and longer-term professional tenants. Currency diversification benefits add appeal for non-European investors, with property ownership in Spain providing both lifestyle advantages and portfolio diversification.

Priced competitively at €790,000 within an appreciating market, positioned in Javea's most exclusive neighborhood, and supported by proven rental income potential, this property merits serious consideration from discerning international investors and families. healthcare.text: Healthcare access represents a significant advantage for Javea residents. Hospital de Dénia (15 km) provides full acute care services, emergency departments, and specialist consultations. Clinica Benidorm (30 km) offers alternative private healthcare options with luxury amenities. The region boasts numerous English-speaking general practitioners and medical specialists, reflecting the established international community. Dental services, physiotherapy, and specialized treatments are readily available locally. EU residents benefit from reciprocal healthcare arrangements, while private insurance options provide comprehensive coverage for all residents. Pharmacy services operate extensively throughout town, with English-speaking pharmacists dispensing prescriptions and medical advice.

education.text: Javea attracts families through its excellent international school options. The compact coastal town encourages walking and cycling for daily errands, promoting an active lifestyle.
